long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Treea is the world’s first browser extension that earns you cash rewards based on retailer sustainability. The higher a retailer’s sustainability score, the more you could earn. It's a simple way to make a difference and save money whenever you shop online.

Here's how it works:

🖥️ Add Treea to your Google Chrome Browser.
🛍️ Shop online as usual at any of our supported retailers.
🎉 Activate rewards to apply them to your purchases. 
🔍 Track pending rewards in your Treea earnings page. 
🫰 Withdraw via PayPal or Direct Bank Transfer.*

Why Choose Treea?

Make a statement: Let retailers know that you value their sustainability. Check, shop, earn and encourage retailer decarbonisation in one click.

Easy to use: Simply add the extension, shop as usual and activate your reward from the Menu, a Google search or by using our simple Slider.

Sustainability snapshots: Easy to understand interface lets you know who’s talking about action and who’s actually taking it. Deep dive into the data via our simple web-app.

Unique rewards mechanism: Rates increase when retailers reduce emissions and become more sustainable. Encourage them to perform even better with each reward you earn. 

Shop at your favourite stores: From fashion, to health & beauty, to homeware - we're adding new retailers and categories continuously. 

Simple reward tracking: see what’s pending, banked and ready to withdraw, all from your Treea dashboard.**

Browser Extension Features:

💪 One-click cash reward activation
🌳 Dynamic rates linked to retailer sustainability scores
🚀 Follow retailers and never miss a reward boost
📈 Actual retailer carbon emissions performance data at a glance
💡 Helpful tooltips

How Does Treea Work with Affiliate Programs?

We use affiliate programs to provide you with cash rewards based on retailer sustainability scores. 

When you shop online at any of our supported retailers using the Treea Extension, we earn a commission through their affiliate programs. 

We share this commission with you in the form of cash rewards, which are linked to each retailer's Sustainability Score. The higher a retailer's Sustainability Score, the more cash rewards you can earn.

By installing the Treea Extension, you consent to the use of affiliate links, and understand that we may use cookies or other tracking technologies to track your purchases and provide the service.


Additional Notes:

*By using the Treea Extension, you agree to Treea’s Terms of Service (https://treea.co.uk/terms-of-service)

**Our extension requires you to allow cookies and whitelist Treea within your Google Chrome browser. 

The Treea Extension is not affiliated with any of the retailers it supports. Any issues or queries associated with your purchases must be directed to the retailer.
 
Reward rates are dynamic and may vary depending on, but not limited to: changes to retailer emissions data, introduction of new retailers to Treea’s dataset, reward boosts (tBoosts) and multipliers that may be activated from time to time. 

By installing the Treea Extension, you consent to the extension accessing retailer websites to provide the service. You can withdraw consent at any time by uninstalling.

When you click “Add to Chrome,” you agree to the additional Treea Extension Policy at: 

https://treea.co.uk/extension-policy

Website:

https://treea.co.uk

Support:

https://treea.co.uk/dashboard?tab=customer-service
